author: noel
msg: Switch to a single Iterator that traverses candidate SMTP hosts.  Alternative approach to fix for JAMES-142.

author: noel
msg: Replaced RuntimeException with MessagingException.  Missed it during earlier change

author: noel
msg: Apply Apache License v2.0.  Since all source files were touched, also removed @author tags, as we'd already done in the MAIN branch.

author: vincenzo
msg: AbstractQuotaMatcher subclasses currently check if the sender is the local Postmaster, and in such case the match fails, in order to make sure that such messages are always delivered.
The same behaviour is needed when the sender is null (better, when the reverse path is NULL: <>), meaning that the message is a Bounce.
